de.axelwernicke.mypod
Class ClipsTableColumnModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.DefaultTableColumnModel
      de.axelwernicke.mypod.ClipsTableColumnModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableColumnModel
public class ClipsTableColumnModel
extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableColumnModel

Column model for myPods list view. This class extends the DefaultTableColumnModel class. Functionality to make sorting of columns persistent, as well as cell renderers are added.

Author:
axel wernicke
See Also:

Method Detail

addColumn

public void addColumn(javax.swing.table.TableColumn column)
Adds a column to a column model. The column is added if, and only if, it is enabled in the preferences object. Width of the column is set from the preferences too.

Parameters:
column - to add to the column model

storeColumnPreferences

public void storeColumnPreferences()
Stores Column Preferences.

restoreColumnPreferences

public void restoreColumnPreferences()
Moves all columns to the position determined from the preferences.

optimizeColumnWidth

public void optimizeColumnWidth(int[] contentWidth,
                                int columnIndex,
                                int minWidth,
                                boolean hideEmptyColumns)
Optimizes the width of a column by its content.

Parameters:
minWidth - minimal column width
hideEmptyColumns - hide empty columns
contentWidth - array containing the width of the cells
columnIndex - index of the column to optimize
